longDescription:
Escape Run is an engaging endless runner game from dhimanp that plunges you into an exciting chase with high-speed gameplay. Choose from characters like Veer and embark on a thrilling adventure through busy streets, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and beating your own high score.

üí® How It Works:
Start by tapping PLAY‚Äîyour character is spotted plucking mangoes and is instantly chased by an angry gardener! Swipe up, down, left, or right to avoid buses, barriers, and other hazards. As speed intensifies, your reflexes matter more‚Äîswipe quickly to survive and rack up points!

üéÆ Gameplay Features:

  • ü™ô Collect coins, score doublers, coin doublers, magnets, shields, and rockets to boost your performance

  • üöÄ Power-ups provide temporary advantages like double points or obstacle immunity

  • üèÖ Increasing speed keeps the gameplay challenging and exhilarating

  • ‚ùå One crash ends your run‚Äîbut every setback is a chance to improve

Perfect for gamers who love fast-paced challenges and want to test their reflexes ‚Äî Escape Run offers addictive fun with minimal setup. Jump in, outrun the gardener, and aim for the highest score!
